title: wine_Wieninger_2012_Bisamberg_Alte_Reben_White_(Wiener_Gemischter_Satz)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 47358.
country: Austria.
description: Initially subdued, the fresh-fruited ripeness of yellow Mirabelle plums and almost an aloe-vera-like scent lead the way, on the palate there is a streamlined but nonetheless nutty,almost smoky, rounded richness with a pleasing lick of freshness. Hazelnuts, wet pebbles and yeasty lees provide an additional dimension to this concentrated, sophisticated wine. This has mileage and will develop over the coming five years..
designation: Bisamberg Alte Reben.
points: 93.
price: 22.0.
province: Wiener Gemischter Satz.
region_1: .
region_2: .
